channel.title: The Digital Photo Experience
channel.itunes:summary:
The Digital Photo Experience by Rick Sammon and Juan Pons.
Bringing you the best photography tips, advice, news and information. Both Rick and Juan live and breathe photography and are always eager to share with you what they know. New episodes twice a month, at the beginning and middle of the month. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us! You can reach us at www.dpexperience.com
The Digital Photo Experience, where YOU are the focus.
channel.itunes:author: Rick Sammon and Juan Pons
channel.copyright: Copyright 2009 Rick Sammon and Juan Pons
channel.itunes:subtitle: Where YOU are our focus

item.title: DPE Podcast 9.15.15 – How do you know if you are making good images plus Rick and Juan answer your questions
item.dc:creator: juan@dpexperience.com (Rick Sammon and Juan Pons)
item.description: This episode of the Digital Photo Experience Rick and Juan discuss how to know if you are making good images, plus we go on a (kind hearted) rant. Lastly we answer some of your questions. Both Rick and Juan love getting and answering your questions. No question is too basic or too advanced, so if […]
item.itunes:subtitle: This episode of the Digital Photo Experience Rick and Juan discuss how to know if you are making good images, plus we go on a (kind hearted) rant. Lastly we answer some of your questions. - Both Rick and Juan love getting and answering your questions.
item.itunes:summary: This episode of the Digital Photo Experience Rick and Juan discuss how to know if you are making good images, plus we go on a (kind hearted) rant. Lastly we answer some of your questions. Both Rick and Juan love getting and answering your questions. No question is too basic or too advanced, so if you have questions you would like answered, please send them on in and we'll get to it pretty soon. You can send your questions via email to RickSammon@me.com or click on the "Contact us" button on the top of the http://dpexperience.com website. Make sure to subscribe to the podcast via iTunes here: DPExperience Podcast on iTunes so you don't miss a single episode. You guys have been doing a phenomenal job giving us great ratings on iTunes. Thank you! If you have not done so yet, we ask that you please take a minute and give us a positive review/rating on iTunes at this link. This is Episode number 134 of the Digital Photo Experience Podcast with Rick Sammon & Juan Pons. We hope you enjoy the episode, and if you do, we would greatly appreciate it if you could give us a positive rating on iTunes. Hey, it only takes a minute! Make sure to subscribe to the podcast via iTunes here: DPExperience Podcast on iTunes so you don't miss a single episode. Listen to the podcast here: To download the mp3 file directly click here If you would like to send us questions for consideration in future episodes, send them to RickSammon@me.com. Hope you enjoy this episode. Show Notes * Dancing with the tripod
item.itunes:author: Rick Sammon & Juan Pons

item.title: DPE Podcast 9.01.15 – Rick and Juan answer your questions

item.itunes:subtitle: This episode of the Digital Photo Experience is all about your questions. Rick and Juan dedicate the entire episode to the questions you have sent in. We love getting your questions, so don't hesitate to send them on in,
item.itunes:summary: This episode of the Digital Photo Experience is all about your questions. Rick and Juan dedicate the entire episode to the questions you have sent in. We love getting your questions, so don't hesitate to send them on in, make sure to email Rick at RickSammon@me.com. Both Rick and Juan love getting and answering your questions. No question is too basic or too advanced, so if you have questions you would like answered, please send them on in and we'll get to it pretty soon. You can send your questions via email to RickSammon@me.com or click on the "Contact us" button on the top of the http://dpexperience.com website. Make sure to subscribe to the podcast via iTunes here: DPExperience Podcast on iTunes so you don't miss a single episode. You guys have been doing a phenomenal job giving us great ratings on iTunes. Thank you! If you have not done so yet, we ask that you please take a minute and give us a positive review/rating on iTunes at this link. This is Episode number 133 of the Digital Photo Experience Podcast with Rick Sammon & Juan Pons. We hope you enjoy the episode, and if you do, we would greatly appreciate it if you could give us a positive rating on iTunes. Hey, it only takes a minute! Make sure to subscribe to the podcast via iTunes here: DPExperience Podcast on iTunes so you don't miss a single episode. Listen to the podcast here: To download the mp3 file directly click here If you would like to send us questions for consideration in future episodes, send them to RickSammon@me.com. Hope you enjoy this episode.

item.title: DPE Podcast 7.15.15 – Staying healthy is important for you photography.
item.dc:creator: juan@dpexperience.com (Rick Sammon and Juan Pons)
item.description: In this episode Rick and Juan discuss the importance of staying healthy to achieve your photography goals. Plus we talk a bit about packing for your next trip. Both Rick and Juan love getting and answering your questions. No question is too basic or too advanced, so if you have questions you would like answered, […]
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode Rick and Juan discuss the importance of staying healthy to achieve your photography goals. Plus we talk a bit about packing for your next trip. - Both Rick and Juan love getting and answering your questions.
item.itunes:summary: In this episode Rick and Juan discuss the importance of staying healthy to achieve your photography goals. Plus we talk a bit about packing for your next trip. Both Rick and Juan love getting and answering your questions. No question is too basic or too advanced, so if you have questions you would like answered, please send them on in and we'll get to it pretty soon. You can send your questions via email to RickSammon@me.com or click on the "Contact us" button on the top of the http://dpexperience.com website.
